artcrew.og_description: Captain Crate brings together a community of artists from all over the world
artcrew.title: Art Crew

newsletter_section.title: Upcrate – We draw as one
newsletter_section.text: Captain Crate has hoisted his sails to bring together a community of artists from all over the world and provide them with the best art materials and tips. every second month he sends his mysterious boxes, which he calls UPCRATE, directly to the front door of every member of his art crew.

draw_as_one_section.title: <2>We draw artists</2> together <1></1> <2>with</2> our <2> creative passion <1></1> and give </2> you the tools <1></1> to follow <2>your heart</2>

chosen_one_section.title:
You’re one of the chosen ones who scrolled all the way down.
Check out Captain Crate’s offers here:

about.og_description: Upcrate – The legend of Captain Crate, his Crates and his Crew
about.title: About us

sections.title: Captain Crate…
sections.text: has gotten to know a wide <1>variety of art materials</1> and their manufacturers on his travels across the seven seas. He is always looking for new connections and treasures for you - <2>his art crew.</2>

sections.title: ...delivers the best every second month...
sections.text: ...from a handpicked selection of new, mysterious materials to you. These are lovingly put together in the crates in order to guarantee our <1>international crew</1> the best quality for trying out new drawing techniques and brands at the lowest price. Each box delivers a <2>new surprise</2> to your home!...

sections.title: …for the art crew
sections.text: Upcrate not only introduces you to hidden treasures of innovative materials, but also broadens your horizons and sparks your creativity. In addition to <1>new materials</1>, you will receive a magazine full of related advice, challenges and opportunities to exchange ideas and <2>make friends with other artists</2> online in order to become better together. One for all and all for one!

sections.title: behind the scenes
sections.text: ...is a team of art lovers, designers and artists. <1>Captain Crate</1> himself was brought to life from Hamburg, Germany. Clemens is the founder of Upcrate and brings the magic and organization into the box through his connections to many global art material manufacturers. <2>A selected team of artists</2> tests and curates the materials for Upcrate to ensure that the materials match so you can let your creativity flow freely!

cancellation_policy.og_description: Mystery art supplies in a bimonthly box
cancellation_policy.title: Cancellation Policy
cancellation_policy.withdrawal_desc: <1>The following cancellation policy is directed exclusively at consumers within the meaning of Section 13 of the German Civil Code (BGB). Accordingly, a consumer is any natural person who enters into a legal transaction for a purpose that can be attributed neither to his commercial nor to his independent professional activity.</1>
cancellation_policy.withdrawal_text: <1>You have the right to withdraw from this contract within fourteen days without giving any reason.  The withdrawal period is fourteen days from the day where you or a third party named by you, who is not the carrier, has or has taken possession of the goods, provided that you have ordered one or more goods under a single order and these are or will be delivered in a uniform manner.  To exercise your right of revocation, you must notify us (COLORSPAZE LTD, Akropoleos 27 5282 Paralimni, Ammochostos CYPRUS, Phone: +357 99539389, opening hours: workdays from 12am to 1pm, email: info@upcrate.art) by means of a clear statement (e.g. a letter sent by post, e-mail) about your decision to withdraw from this contract. You can use the attached model withdrawal form, which is not required.  In order to maintain the cancellation period, it is sufficient that you send the notice of the exercise of the right of withdrawal before the expiry of the withdrawal period.</1>
cancellation_policy.consequences_text: If you revoke this contract, we are obliged to refund all payments we have received from you, including delivery costs (except for additional costs arising from you choosing a different type of delivery than the cheapest standard delivery offered by us), without undue delay and at the latest within fourteen days from the day we receive notification of your revocation of this contract. For this refund, we will use the same means of payment that you used in the original transaction, unless expressly agreed otherwise with you; in no case will you be charged fees for this refund. We may refuse the refund until we have received the goods back or until you have provided proof that you have returned the goods, whichever is earlier. You must return or hand over the goods to the following address without undue delay and in any event no later than fourteen days from the day on which you inform us of the revocation of this contract:<2><1>Güstrower Werkstätten GmbH</1><1>Koppelweg 14</1><1>D-18273 Güstrow</1><1>Germany</1></2>The deadline is met if you dispatch the goods before the period of fourteen days has expired. You bear the direct costs of returning the goods. You are only liable for any diminished value of the goods if this loss in value is due to handling that was not necessary to ascertain the nature, characteristics, and functioning of the goods.

what_the_artcrew_says.title: what the art crew says:
what_the_artcrew_says.text:
If you want to send us a review about upcrate just
send us a DM on instagram:)

quotes.author: Kaia
quotes.text: “I use Upcrate to fuel my creativity and experience new art supplies. Each crate is like a little treasure chest I find on my doorstep every second month.”

quotes.author: Multicooleur
quotes.text: “Upcrate is the first art supply box I have ever tried and that I recommend to everyone. You’ll find all you need to make an awesome piece of art and discover new mediums . I personally enjoy the little extras, they never fail to surprise me !”

quotes.author: Karolien
quotes.text: “I love how upcrate surprises me every second month by letting explore art suplies that I never would consider to try out. I get out of my comfort zone discover new media and found new art supplies that I love.”

quotes.author: Sönke
quotes.text: “Upcrate is like a grab bag full of high quality art supplies. every second month I look forward to the challenge of creating an artwork for the #upcratebattle with new, partly unknown art supplies.”

featured_artists_we_worked_with.title: Featured artists we worked with
featured_artists_we_worked_with.text: These are 4 of the many artists we have worked with in the past. Each of them come with their own unique styles, knowledge and preferences when it comes to art supplies. They curate the contents of their box to make sure that all the materials work well together. Don’t forget to check them out and shower them in love!

how_it_works.title: How it works
how_it_works.subtitle: If you’re not familiar with subscription boxes then you might be wondering how this all works. It’s fairly simple….

steps.text: subscribe to upcrate, add it to the cart and checkout.
our art treasures will be put together by Captain Crates crew and will be shipped out with the next batch of boxes on the 10 th of every second month.

Unbox your creativity with your new supplies and our co-captain’s (artist of the month) video, interview and art advice. Share your artwork your the art crew (#upcrate) and participate in our bimonthly #upcratebattle!
If you loved your box and want to stay subscribed - relax and wait until the next month. Your subscription automatically renews and your next crate is already saved for you.

In case you’re getting seasick on the way and you’d like to cancel your subscription, simply log into your customer account and opt out at any time. No further payments will be taken until you decide to hop on board again.

Expand your artistic skills and learn from professional artists
Use your coordinated materials for your own art projects

faqs.question: How do I subscribe to Upcrate?
faqs.answer: <1>Click here</1> to subscribe to our bimonthly box that ships every second month

faqs.question: Where does Upcrate ship to?
faqs.answer: It is simple. We ship worldwide.

faqs.question: Do I have to expect a delivery charge?
faqs.answer: Shipping costs within Germany are included in the product price. Shipping is free of charge. For shipments outside of Germany shipping costs will be charged. The shipping costs for your country will be displayed during the check-out process (before payment).

faqs.question: Which art supplies will be in the crate?
faqs.answer: That’s a surprise and part of the excitement of Upcrate! You’ll never know what is going to be inside before it arrives, but you can be certain that you’ll discover new, high quality art supplies you might love.

faqs.question: How many items will be in each crate?
faqs.answer: This is a mystery as well. The box is filled depending on the value of the art supplies. . But you can be sure that the value of your new art supplies is worth more than the price you pay for your subscription (minus shipping costs)

faqs.question: Why is there a cut-off date?
faqs.answer: Each second month we have a cut-off date of the 10th to ensure we can plan for all the boxes to be packed and shipped. All subscribers that start with their Upcrate after this date will be added to the subscriber list for the next month. The cut of dates are 10 th of January, 10 th of March, 10 th of May, 10 th of July, 10 th of September, 10 th of November.

faqs.question: How long until I get my crate?
faqs.answer: Your box will be shipped around the 10th of every second month. It will take about 2-3 business days to reach subscribers in Germany, 4-7 working days for subscribes in Europe and 10-15 working days to reach international subscribers.

faqs.question: I’d love to gift this box to a relative or friend! Is that possible?
faqs.answer: Yes! Just click the “gift” option on our website and fill out your invoice address and the delivery address of the person you want to surprise with Upcrate. Your loved one is going to receive a previous box or current box... and they’ll even find a Captain Crate card with their name and yours inside! All gift boxes ship twice a week.

faqs.question: What is the difference between a gift box and a regular subscription?
faqs.answer: A Gift box is a one-time order, meaning that it is not a subscription that automatically renews itself. A gift box is a random draw of a previous box that ships twice a week.

faqs.question: How do I become a featured artist in one of the crates?
faqs.answer: We welcome talented artists that would like to become part of Upcrate. Send us an email with some photos of your artworks to info@upcrate.art and we will get back to you soon.

faqs.question: I’d love to see my products and art supplies in one of your future crates? How do I get in touch with you?
faqs.answer: You are convinced our subscribers should get their hands on your products? Send uns an email at support@upcrate.art with more information about your products and we’ll get back to you.

faqs.question: How can I pay to subscribe?
faqs.answer: You have different options using Paypal, credit cards, or Apple pay.. Check out our payment options during the check-out process.

faqs.question: Can I pay in US dollars or any other currency?
faqs.answer: As we are based in Europe all prices on the website are listed in EUR. If you are an international subscriber your payment provider will make the conversion to your local currency automatically.

faqs.question: When will I be billed for my subscription?
faqs.answer: You will be billed once you start your subscription. For all the following boxes the payment date is always the 1 st of every second month. The exact dates are the 1 st of January, 1 st of March, 1 st of May, 1 st of July, 1 st of September, 1 st of November.

faqs.question: If I cancel my subscription, do I get a refund?
faqs.answer: Canceling your subscription only stops the subscription and prevents any more payments being processed. You will still be sent the box that you had previously paid for before cancelling. You may have the chance to get a refund if the box has not been shipped. Please get in touch with us at support@upcrate.art

faqs.question: Any other questions?
faqs.answer: Feel free to contact us anytime at support@upcrate.art! We are looking forward to hearing from you!

faqs.question: When can I quit my subscription?
faqs.answer: You can cancel your subscription at any time. Just login into your account. Click to “My subscription”, there you can find the Action “Unsubscribe”.

cookies.title: The art of Cookies
cookies.description:
This website uses cookies to improve your experience.
We’ll assume you’re ok with this, but you can opt-out if you wish

settings.title: Privacy Overview
settings.description: This website uses cookies to improve your experience while you navigate through the website. Out of these cookies, the cookies that are categorized as necessary are stored on your browser as they are essential for the working of basic functionalities of the website. We also use third-party cookies that help us analyze and understand how you use this website. These cookies will be stored in your browser only with your consent. You also have the option to opt-out of these cookies. But opting out of some of these cookies may have an effect on your browsing experience.
